dc_title_s: Map of Massachusetts, Connecticut and Rhode Island constructed from the latest authorities
dc_description_s: Longitude in degrees west from Greenwich and east from Washington, D.C.; latitude in degrees north from equator.; Colored by county; borders of states in red.; Bristol county colored yellow, Plymouth county colored pink.; Indicates roads, canals (actual and proposed) and railroads (actual and proposed).; Includes inset map of Boston, colored by ward, with its own scale and key.; Boston & Maine railroad not indicated in inset.; Includes the Hudson River Valley to the confluence of the Mohawk, and Long Island.|52 x 57 centimeters|Scale [1:630,000]|General Map Collection
